column1: ;Save this page as a text file; Select 'File', 'Save As' and in the 'Save as type' box select 'CSV (Comma delimited (*.csv)'
;Then, open the *.csv file with a text editor (such as notepad) and just copy this into the relevant areas of your levelfile and missphere files
;Do not change any of the coloured boxes as they all contain imported data from the listed sheets. You can change everything else.
